meanings.definition: Predictions or prophecies made by a soothsayer.
meanings.sent1: The ancient soothsayings were believed to reveal the future.
meanings.sent2: She read the soothsayings in the old book with curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The soothsayings of the fortune teller brought smiles to the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His soothsayings were like whispers from the past, echoing into the present.
meanings.sent5: The soothsayings painted a vivid picture of what was to come.

meanings.definition: The act of foretelling the future.
meanings.sent1: Believing in soothsayings can bring comfort during uncertain times.
meanings.sent2: The accuracy of her soothsayings amazed everyone at the gathering.
meanings.sent3: The soothsayings of the weatherman predicted a sunny day ahead.
meanings.sent4: Her soothsayings were like a roadmap guiding them through the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The soothsayings lingered in the air, creating an aura of mystery.
